channel.title: Anyone remember what this was?
channel.description:
I need help remembering what this was. My description may seem vague but I need your help! ([b]this info is what I remember from probably 5 or so years ago[/b])
Ok, so you would download this program and a small black window would be open in the bottom right corner of your screen with a bunch of IP's, as well as your own for hosting a private server, even if you weren't running one. You would click on one or something like that and join it. Typically there would be a ::starter function and a place for training, usually a random open space with a massive amount of different leveled NPC's manually spawned there. You could get 99 in 5 minutes and the NPC's would drop very random stuff, like a dragon would drop dboots, a whip, and cash all at once sometimes. You could also obtain a b ring, or some kind of ring I can't remember if it's b or some other letter, anyway it would make all of your damage stats 99999 and you would 1 hit literally anything.
I am searching for servers similar to this.
I am also searching for servers where you can level past 99 and have cool custom/upgraded weapons that don't require you to donate or something like that.

item.title: Anyone remember what this was?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I think the ring your talking about was a p ring not a b ring. Can’t remember for sure though lol

Read full topic

item.description:

damn, that brings back memories. you’re gonna have a hard time finding servers like that nowadays

item.title: Anyone remember what this was?
item.dc:creator: @lysolmax lysolmax
item.description:
@lysolmax wrote:

yesss hamachi! And i know they’re server features but that’s how most of them were on there. Thanks again!

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember what this was?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The program you are talking about is hamachi I believe. The rest of what you’re talking about is just server features, which you can look for on the Server Status Page or advertisements board.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember what this was?
item.dc:creator: @lysolmax lysolmax
item.description:
@lysolmax wrote:

I need help remembering what this was. My description may seem vague but I need your help! (this info is what I remember from probably 5 or so years ago)

Ok, so you would download this program and a small black window would be open in the bottom right corner of your screen with a bunch of IP’s, as well as your own for hosting a private server, even if you weren’t running one. You would click on one or something like that and join it. Typically there would be a ::starter function and a place for training, usually a random open space with a massive amount of different leveled NPC’s manually spawned there. You could get 99 in 5 minutes and the NPC’s would drop very random stuff, like a dragon would drop dboots, a whip, and cash all at once sometimes. You could also obtain a b ring, or some kind of ring I can’t remember if it’s b or some other letter, anyway it would make all of your damage stats 99999 and you would 1 hit literally anything.

I am searching for servers similar to this.

I am also searching for servers where you can level past 99 and have cool custom/upgraded weapons that don’t require you to donate or something like that.

Read full topic
